short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix comments and stars rating by Ali Kaan BAÅžHAN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix Comments and Stars Rating is a powerful Chrome extension that enhances your Netflix viewing experience by allowing you to view and contribute comments and ratings for any movie or TV show on the platform. With this extension, you can access user-generated reviews and ratings in real-time, helping you make more informed decisions about what to watch next.
